title: Blancho Bedding - [Dandelion Dream] Luxury 4PC Mini Comforter Set Combo 300GSM (Full Size)
features: Full size, consisting of two pillow shams, a duvet cover & a down-alternative comforter.
Full size comforter measures 76 by 87 inches with 45 oz hypo-allergenic breathable filling.
This combo combines a duvet cover set with fashionable designs and a down-alternative comforter.
A great way to freshen up any decor; Shrinkproof, anti-pilling and fading proof processes.
Environment-friendly dyes; Fine and concentrated stitches; Machine washable and dryable.
description: Three-piece set for Twin size (consisting of a pillow sham, a duvet cover & a comforter) Four-piece set for Full, Queen and King Size (consisting of two pillow shams, a duvet cover & a comforter)
Twin (Duvet cover and Comforter : 67 x 87 inches; Pillow sham : 20 x 30 inches);
Twin (Duvet cover and Comforter : 67 x 87 inches; Pillow sham : 20 x 30 inches);

Duvet covers are economical option to change the look and feel of your bed room without having to completely redecorate. Using duvet covers means not to invest a lot of money to do some changing in bedrooms. Duvet covers can be washed much more often than can your quilted comforter. Too-frequent washing (even dry cleaning) can compromise your comforter's down fill. However, a cotton duvet cover can be laundered along with the sheets and pillowcases. This keeps the down comforter fresh as well. If you have ever priced dry cleaning for a fine comforter, you understand why cleaning it less often is a huge advantage! With a zipper on one end and twill ties at each inside corner of the duvet cover for you to tie to corresponding embroidered eyelet loop at corner of the comforter, so the comforter can be more securely tied to a duvet cover to keep it from shifting inside its cover while you sleep. Complete any bedroom decor with this stylish duvet cover set from Blancho Bedding.
